list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cease work or movement in order to relax, refresh oneself, or recover strength.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he needed to rest after the feverish activity
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh cần nghỉ ngơi sau hoạt động sốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be placed or supported so as to stay in a specified position.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her elbow was resting on the arm of the sofa
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khuỷu tay của cô đang nghỉ ngơi trên cánh tay của ghế sofa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be based on or grounded in; depend on.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the country's security rested on its alliances
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: An ninh của đất nước nằm trên các liên minh của nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: remain or be left in a specified condition.
an instance or period of relaxing or ceasing to engage in strenuous or stressful activity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you look as though you need a rest
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bạn trông như thể bạn cần nghỉ ngơi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an interval of silence of a specified duration.
an object that is used to support something.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: what do you want to do for the rest of your life?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn muốn làm gì cho đến hết đời?
